data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Özdemir, Shalva Barjadze Işil (2014): A new genus of Macrosiphini Wilson, 1910 (1887) (Hemiptera: Aphididae) from Rhododendron in Turkey. Zootaxa 3835 (1): 121-126, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3835.1.7
